import React from "react" function Post (props) { function like () { likeClass = (likeAmount === (likeAmount.props + 1) ? "":"heart-filled") likeIcon = (likeAmount === (likeAmount.props + 1) ? "heart-outline":"heart") setLikeAmount ( likeAmount + 1) } const [likeAmount, setLikeAmount] = React.useState(props.likeAmount) let likeClass = "" let likeIcon = "heart-outline" return (
{props.user}
Curtido por {props.userLike} e outras {likeAmount} pessoas
) } export default Post
